content: foll following row 15 to 16 repeat row 13 and 14 k knit row 17 p4 k7 p4 k2tog knit two stitches together decrease by 1 row 18 k3 kfb kfb k5 kfb kfb k3 19 sts kfb knit into front and back increase by 1 row 19 p5 k9 p5 p purl row 20 knit repeat repeat row 21 to 22 repeat row 19 and 20 rs right side row 23 p5 k9 p5 ssk slip the next stitch knit-wise then slip the row 24 k4 kfb kfb k7 kfb kfb k4 23 sts next stitch purl-wise and knit through the row 25 p6 k11 p6 front of the 2 slipped sts decrease by 1 row 26 knit st s stitch es row 27 to 28 repeat row 25 and 26 st st stockinette row 29 p6 k11 p6 decrease together row 30 k4 kfb k1 kfb k9 kfb k1 kfb k4 27 sts ws wrong side row 31 p7 k13 p7 alec the alligator copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 2 of 3 row 32 knit alligator legs make 4 start at the top of the leg cast on 6 sts in row 33 to 42 repeat row 31 and 32 five more green on 3 25mm needles times row 1 to 7 starting on a ws purl row work 7 row row 43 p7 k13 p7 in st st row 44 k2 k2tog k1 8 times k1 19 sts row 8 k1 kfb k2 kfb k1 8 sts row 45 p5 k9 p5 row 9 purl ⇨ note row 45 is the neckline mark the sts at row 10 k2 kfb 2 times k2 10 sts each end of the row row 11 purl row 46 k2 kfb k1 8 times k1 27 sts cast off all sts row 47 p7 k13 p7 row 48 knit making up row 49 to 50 repeat row 47 and 48 row 51 p7 k13 p7 ⇨ note use mattress stitch for seaming row 52 k2 k2tog k1 3 times k6 k2tog k1 3 body insert the toy safety eyes then sew the side times k1 21 sts edges of the body decrease stuffing as you sew gather the cast on sts decrease at the tail at the neckline row row 53 p5 k11 p5 45 tie a 30cm length of green yarn around the row 54 knit neck and pull tight knot firmly and hide the yarn row 55 to 56 repeat row 53 and 54 tails inside the stuffing embroider a zigzag of teeth in white yarn around the front of the head row 57 p6 k9 p6 legs for each leg fold the cast off edge in half and row 58 k4 ssk k2tog k5 ssk k2tog k4 17 sts oversew this edge closed at the bottom of the foot row 59 p5 k7 p5 sew the side edges of the leg decrease and sew the cast row 60 knit on edge onto the side of the body
